overview: The story of Kanphon, the son of a great politician, who meets Pailin, a young woman living in a poor community. giving him the opportunity to be close to people in the community until it can change the attitude that used to be towards these people But the relationship that turned into love for both of them was met with obstacles. both from Kanphon's family and from people in the community who know the truth about who he is must find a way to break the wall of hatred between classes this time.
title: The Wall
